2027760.name: Bridgebourn
2027760.description:
Explore a hand-painted semi-open world. Discover secrets and treasure with your band of adventurers in this story rich ARPG. Experiment with powerful reactions by creating custom abilities or combining spells. Upgrade your skill trees. Fight what lurks in the depths of dungeons. Enhance your playstyle with magic loot. Uncover mysteries of the Fadelands. Play Single-Player, local co-op or through Steam Remote Play.

Bridgebourn focuses on modern nostalgia, immersive exploration, and a unique hand-painted art style with fresh game mechanics.

Adventure is Awaiting You.

Embark into a hand-crafted open wilderness filled with adventure. Wander off of paths to find secrets. Sail the seas and discover hidden lands. Partake in quests and pursue a captivating campaign with plenty of side content as you unravel the secrets of the uncharted and deadly Fadelands.

An Ever Changing World.

Use the weather and shifting environmental factors as you plan your travels to your advantage. Passages and secrets will open up and close off. Treasure will be influenced. Certain abilities and enemies may grow stronger. You may find something new in a place you thought you already explored.

The Trek will be Dangerous.

Foes that you encounter on your journey will test your strength. Unleash your creativity by making custom spells. Combine abilities with potent reactions. Strategically chain attacks with your party members to create deadly effects. Do whatever it takes to achieve victory in battle.

Joyful Company.

Build your own character and play-style. Control or issue commands to any of the three other members of your party - each having their own style to synergize with you in battle. Optionally play with 4 player local-coop or through Steam Remote Play to have your friends join you on the journey.

Progression.

Strengthen your character by leveling up, finding loot, upgrading ability trees and creating custom spells. Explore new lands to find more items and new abilities.
